snippet: Cleveland traded running back Trent Richardson to the Colts for a first-round draft pick, just a year after the Browns picked Richardson in the first round of the draft.
abstract: NFL Roundup; Cleveland Browns trade running back Trent Richardson to Indianapolis Colts for a first-round draft pick; other football developments noted.

byline.original: By THE ASSOCIATED PRESS and BEN SHPIGEL

lead_paragraph: Cleveland traded running back Trent Richardson to the Colts for a first-round draft pick, just a year after the Browns picked Richardson in the first round of the draft.

headline.main: On Day Full of Changes, the Browns Trade Richardson
headline.print_headline: On Day Full of Changes, the Browns Trade Richardson
